info.name: Unicode Code Submission API
info.description: Complete test cases for all 10 problems with working code examples

body.raw:
{
  "problemId": 2,
  "language": "python",
  "code": "l1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
l2 = list(map(int, input().split()))

carry = 0
result = []
i = 0

while i < len(l1) or i < len(l2) or carry:
    val1 = l1[i] if i < len(l1) else 0
    val2 = l2[i] if i < len(l2) else 0
    total = val1 + val2 + carry
    result.append(total % 10)
    carry = total // 10
    i += 1

print(' '.join(map(str, result)))"
}

item.name: Problem 4: Median of Two Sorted Arrays (Python)

body.raw:
{
  "problemId": 4,
  "language": "python",
  "code": "nums1_str = input().strip()
nums2_str = input().strip()

nums1 = list(map(int, nums1_str.split())) if nums1_str else []
nums2 = list(map(int, nums2_str.split())) if nums2_str else []

merged = sorted(nums1 + nums2)
n = len(merged)

if n % 2 == 1:
    median = float(merged[n // 2])
else:
    median = (merged[n // 2 - 1] + merged[n // 2]) / 2.0

print(median)"
}

{
  "problemId": 7,
  "language": "python",
  "code": "height = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = len(height) - 1
max_area = 0

while left < right:
    width = right - left
    h = min(height[left], height[right])
    area = width * h
    max_area = max(max_area, area)
    
    if height[left] < height[right]:
        left += 1
    else:
        right -= 1

print(max_area)"
}
